kubectl.versionsNewScript: Invoke-WebRequest https://api.github.com/repos/kubernetes/kubernetes/git/refs/tags | ConvertFrom-Json | % { $_.ref -replace 'refs/tags/v', '' } | ? { $_ -match '^\d+\.\d+\.\d+$' } | Sort-Object { [version]$_ } -Descending | ? { [version]$_ -ge [version]'1.14' }     # Alternative, but not updated promptly despite release on github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes: $y = (Invoke-WebRequest https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubernetes/website/main/data/releases/schedule.yaml).Content | ConvertFrom-Yaml; $y.schedules | % { $_.next.release }; $y = (Invoke-WebRequest https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubernetes/website/main/data/releases/eol.yaml).Content | ConvertFrom-Yaml;Z$y.branches | % { $_.finalPatchRelease }
